question: Which international organisation will get 2017 Mother Teresa Memorial Award Award for social justice?
option2: International Committee of the Red Cross (ICRC)
option3: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
answer: United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR)
explanation: The United Nations High Commissioner for Refugees (UNHCR) has been named as the recipient of the Harmony Foundation's 2017 Mother Teresa Memorial Award for Social Justice as an acknowledgement of its exceptional work worldwide.
